arm_group.arm_group_label: Back care pillow & standard physical therapy treatment
arm_group.description: standard physical therapy treatment for 6 sessions of treatment, each around 30 minutes, during a period of 2 weeks & back care pillow use during the day for 2 weeks
standard physical therapy treatment for 6 sessions of treatment, each around 30 minutes, during a period of 2 weeks

brief_summary.textblock:
This study aim to investigate the effects of back care pillow, in adjective with standard
      physical therapy treatment for chronic non-specific low back pain.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of Back Care Pillow in Addition to Physical Therapy in Chronic Non-specific Low Back Pain Treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Males or females

          -  Age 20 - 69 years old.

          -  Patients who have daily routine in so long bending of sitting or standing position at
             least 2 hours per day

          -  Patients with low back pain who have pain for more than 3 months

          -  Patients have pain at lower back without refer to leg

          -  Patients have moderate to severe pain  of numerical rating scale (pain score ≥ 4)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Pregnant patients

          -  Underlying systematic or visceral disease, and specific condition such as   neoplasm,
             ankylosing spondylitis, previous low back surgery

          -  Patients have Quada equine syndrome

          -  Patients with nerve root symptoms (neurological deficit)

               1. Patient have refer pain to leg area of same dermatome is problem.

               2. Abnormal reflex of lower extremity.

               3. Muscle weakness of area myotome is problem.

intervention.arm_group_label: Back care pillow & standard physical therapy treatment
intervention.description: back care pillow is specific size by age groups of standard deviation of the lumbar spinal curvature, in 20-29 years was 51.68 ± 6.94 degrees, in 30-39 years was 59.67 ± 7.02 degrees, in 40-49 years was 63.66 ± 7.62 degrees, in 50-59 years was 65.75 ± 10.85 degrees and in 60-69 years was 64.19 ± 9.69 degrees

arm_group_label: Back care pillow & standard physical therapy treatment
intervention.description: standard physical therapy treatment are ultrasound therapy and hot pack
